column2: BRIEF-BankUnited Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.77 April 25 (Reuters) - BankUnited Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.72 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * NET INTEREST INCOME INCREASED BY $17.2 MILLION TO $247.8 MILLION FOR QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 FROM MARCH 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
